thread.title: Elderly couple proves matching outfits can be cute, not creepy | New York Post
thread.title_full: Elderly couple proves matching outfits can be cute, not creepy | New York Post

author: Raquel Laneri
title: Elderly couple proves matching outfits can be cute, not creepy | New York Post
text:
コートを脱いで撮影。 bonのニットジャケットとponのカーディガンは共にユニクロ。 #couple #over60 #fashion #coordinate #outfit #ootd #instafashion #instaoutfit #instagramjapan #whitehair #silverhair #greyhair #夫婦 #60代 #ファッション #コーディネート #夫婦コーデ #今日のコーデ #グレイヘア #白髪 #共白髪 
A post shared by bon_pon (@bonpon511) on Feb 27, 2017 at 12:23am PST 
Dressing like your significant other is often a surefire way to inspire eye-rolls and ridicule — see Britney Spears’ and Justin Timberlake’s matching denim-on-denim ensembles , which will live on forever in infamy.
But one elderly couple has managed to turn their twinning into social- media gold.
Known on Instagram as @bonpon511 — a combination of their first names and their wedding anniversary, according to the Daily Mail — this Japanese husband-and-wife duo has amassed more than 100,000 followers in just three months with shots of their craftily coordinated wardrobes.
IKEAに行くときは青い服を着たくなります #couple #over60 #fashion #coordinate #outfit #ootd #instafashion #instaoutfit #instagramjapan #whitehair #silverhair #greyhair #夫婦 #60代 #ファッション #コーディネート #グレイヘア #白髪 #共白髪 
A post shared by bon_pon (@bonpon511) on Dec 8, 2016 at 8:08pm PST 
Married for almost 37 years, the fashion-forward couple wear matching outfits every day. If one wears a blue gingham dress, the other will wear a blue checkered shirt. If one wears a Tartan overcoat with a fair isle sweater, the other will compliment the outfit with a slightly different colored fair isle sweater and matching Tartan kilt. The two tend to stick to a neutral palette of black, white and gray, shot with bright red or blue, or enlivened with plaid or polka dots. And they deftly mix avant-garde labels like Comme des Garcons with basics from Uniqlo as well as vintage finds.
赤🔴を差し色に #couple #over60 #fashion #coordinate #outfit #ootd #instafashion #instaoutfit #instagramjapan #whitehair #silverhair #greyhair #夫婦 #60代 #ファッション #コーディネート #夫婦コーデ #今日のコーデ #グレイヘア #白髪 #共白髪 
A post shared by bon_pon (@bonpon511) on Feb 12, 2017 at 12:17am PST 
But it’s not just their meticulous ensembles that attract fans. The pair clearly have a sweet whimsy that comes through in their photos, which often depict them posing in rabbit-eared hats or next to unicorn sculptures.
“You guys are such an inspiration,” wrote one commenter . “I love it; you both have probably so much fun.”
ミッフィー展にて #couple #over60 #fashion #coordinate #outfit #ootd #instafashion #instaoutfit #instagramjapan #whitehair #silverhair #greyhair #夫婦 #60代 #ファッション #コーディネート #グレイヘア #白髪 #共白髪 
A post shared by bon_pon (@bonpon511) on Dec 4, 2016 at 5:17am PST
